title: Ronnie Ortiz-Magro and Jen Harley are on again as they dine in Beverly Hills
text:
Ronnie Ortiz-Magro and Jen Harley are together again.

The Jersey Shore star, 33, and his child's mother, 32, were seen at the posh Beverly Hills restaurant Il Pastaio Thursday, as Ronnie confirmed the on-again, off-again couple was on again.

'Like right now yeah ... everything's good bro,' he told TMZ, while Harley said, 'We're always good,' later saying on Instagram, 'We got that love; the crazy kind.'

Reunited: Ronnie Ortiz-Magro, 33, and Jen Harley, 32, were seen at the posh Beverly Hills restaurant Il Pastaio Thursday, as Ronnie confirmed the on-again, off-again couple was on again

Both were clad in all-black ensembles as they stepped out in the 90210, with Ronnie clad in a shirt with jeans and red Nike sneakers and a red watch, while Harley wore a black top with black pants and designer sandal heels, with a sweater tied around her waist.

He added that the food at the upscale establishment was 'good, good, good' and that he was in Southern California to launch his new company Verge CBD.

Harley shared a series of shots to her Instagram Stories, including one from the city's famed Rodeo Drive.

The couple, who share one-year-old daughter Ariana Sky, have made headlines throughout 2019 amid a number of conflicts. Most recently, they parted last month amid Harley's suspicion Ronnie was unfaithful to her, which sources close to Ronnie told TMZ was not the case.

Matching: Both were clad in all-black ensembles as they stepped out in the 90210

On business: Ronnie said he was in Southern California to launch his new company Verge CBD

Gourmet: Ronnie added that the food at the upscale establishment was 'good, good, good'

Harley has been arrested twice over the past two years in connection with domestic battery incidents involving Ronnie. Asked how he deals with the public interest in his relationship with Harley, Ronnie said his tack was to 'just ignore everybody' and 'just keep going.'

Ronnie lauded his Jersey Shore castmate Mike 'The Situation' Sorrentino for wisely using his time in prison in his 2018 tax evasion conviction, as he said his friend is 'looking jacked' after spending two-thirds of the year in custody.

'Have you seen him? My man looks good!' Ronnie said, joking, 'I feel like I want to go to prison for eight months!'

Jersey Shore: Family Vacation airs Thursdays on MTV at 8/7c.

Troubles: Harley been arrested twice over the past two years in connection with domestic battery incidents involving Ronnie

Supportive: Ronnie lauded his Jersey Shore castmate Mike 'The Situation' Sorrentino for wisely using his time in prison

Parenthood: The couple share a one-year-old daughter named Ariana Sky
description: The Jersey Shore star, 33, and his child's mother, 32, were seen at the posh Beverly Hills restaurant IL Pastaio Thursday.
